R

radius - Variable in class raytracer.primitives.Sphere
Radius of the sphere.
ray - Variable in class raytracer.primitives.Intersection
Ray, for which an intersection was found.
Ray - Class in raytracer.primitives
A ray with an origin and a normalized direction.
Ray(Vector3d, Vector3d) - Constructor for class raytracer.primitives.Ray
Constructor for a ray with given origin and direction.
raytracer.lights - package raytracer.lights
 
raytracer.material - package raytracer.material
 
raytracer.primitives - package raytracer.primitives
 
raytracer.render - package raytracer.render
 
reflectivity - Variable in class raytracer.material.Material
Degree of reflectivity in the range of [0, 1], where 1 is a perfect mirror.
renderColorOf1stHit(Scenery, BufferedImage) - Method in class raytracer.render.Camera
Renders an image by setting each pixel value to the color of the first intersected object.
renderDepth(Scenery, BufferedImage) - Method in class raytracer.render.Camera
Renders an image by setting each to a grey value representing the distance of the first intersection to the camera.
renderImage(Scenery, BufferedImage) - Method in class raytracer.render.Camera
Renders an image of a scene via raytracing.
renderNormals(Scenery, BufferedImage) - Method in class raytracer.render.Camera
Renders an image by setting the color value of each pixel according to the normal at the first intersection.
resX - Variable in class raytracer.render.Camera
Horizontal resolution of the image to be rendered.
resY - Variable in class raytracer.render.Camera
Vertical resolution of the image to be rendered.
rightDir - Variable in class raytracer.render.Camera
Right-vector of the camera (orthogonal to upDir and viewDir).
